transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello? Haan.
Executive: Pramod ji?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Please call mat disconnect kijiyega Pramod ji. Pankaj baat kar raha hu IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Aapka sir jo Bhagwati Industries se catalog hai us regarding aapke account manager se aapki baat hui thi aur aapne WhatsApp pe not satisfied ka feedback diya unke liye sir.
Executive: Usi ke liye mai try kar raha hu do teen din se last connect karne ka aapse. Kuch problem issue aa raha hai sir services me ya unse kuch problem hua hai aapko?
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi kaam band hai rehne de kaam ki.
Executive: Haan ji sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Sir sun pa rahe hai mujhe?
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Mai ye bol raha hu ki aapki na aapke account manager Manju se baat hui hogi Bhagwati Industries catalog jo run kar raha hai na IndiaMART pe uske regarding.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Unse baat karne ke baad aapne WhatsApp pe not satisfied ka feedback share kiya sir. To kya problem issue aa raha hai jo resolve nahi kar pae hum?
Customer: Nahi nahi koi problem nahi.
Executive: To fir sir aap mai try kar raha hu to last do teen din se aap mere se baat bhi nahi kar rahe sir aur not satisfied bhi hai but bina baat discussion ke kaise resolve hoga aapka issue sir? Sir abhi kaam hai nahi band pada hai isliye matlab nahi koi.
Executive: Kaam abhi aapka offline bhi band hi hai?
Customer: Offline band hai repairing ka kaam chal raha hai.
Executive: Okay isiliye aap use nahi kar rahe IndiaMART yaha pe?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: To unse to kuch problem nahi hai na sir aapko aapke account manager se ya IndiaMART se services ko to kuch issue nahi hai na aapko?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To fir aapne not satisfied kyu diya sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Waha pe to likha hua tha ki agar aap satisfied nahi hai Manju se baat karke to aap feedback dijiye feedback ke liye tha wo message jaha pe aapne not satisfied mark kar diya.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Usse pehle bhi maine ek mail kiya hua hai dekha aapne?
Customer: Mail ek baar check karta hu aapka mail.
Executive: Mail aapka ji sir aaya hua hai last year aaya tha sir December me isse pehle mail.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Usme aapne purchase one year plan not satisfied. Accha aapne last year bhi yahi bola tha ki mai services se satisfied nahi hu mera amount refund kar dijiye.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: To ab to aapka waise bhi one year complete ho gaya sir.
Customer: Haan to wahi baat hai.
Executive: To aapne starting se hi aapka kaam band ho gaya tha kya sir yaha pe register karne ke baad hi tab to aapne register hi kiya hoga IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Kaam to chalu hi tha.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Par is aapki nahi thi isliye band gaya fir.
Executive: Fir aapne use hi nahi kiya usko service.
Customer: Use nahi kiya fir kya kare hum? Pehle koi Ravi karke tha manager usse baat ki matlab nahi koi maine try bahut kiya.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Hmm. Humko lead chahiye.
Customer: Payment to ho hi gaya tha sir uske baad use karte to shayad kuch milta sir convert hota customer.
Executive: Kiya kiya maine teen char mahina use kiya hua hai. Lead bhi kafi consume ki par sahi nahi aaya.
Executive: Maine dekha December me aapne aath din use kiya uske baad January me aapne che din use kiya February me paanch din uske baad fir aapne bilkul chhod diya fir June me do din beech me use kiya fir August me ek din bas ye use hai sir aapka. Total matlab 12 mahine me se aapka.
Customer: Mai shuruwat me kafi maine ki thi do teen mahine lagatar fir nahi kiya.
Executive: Matlab koi bhi customer convert nahi ho paya aapka?
Customer: Nahi ho paya. Convert nahi ho paya plus isme wo lead kafi farzi aa rahi thi kafi wo tha. Minimum order ka koi tha hi nahi.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Wahi baat hai fir hamara supply rehta hai bulk me wo tha hi nahi isme.
Executive: Aur yaha retail ka inquiries aa raha tha aapko.
Customer: Retail ka inquiry aa raha tha pura.
Executive: To is wajah se wo hua nahi aur aapne fir us pe karna band kar diya.
Customer: Hua nahi. Itni baar maine tere ko bhi bola. Aapki team ko bhi mail wagera. Lekin abhi ye to store us pe rahega na sir ki jaisa customer demand kar raha hai aapke product se related wahi inquiry hum show karwate IndiaMART koi banata thodi na sir by list wagera.
Customer: Are wo baat wahi baat hai to maine usme liya tha usme maine bola tha mera minimum order ka rehta hai requirement.
Executive: Aapka jab liya tha aapka welcome call hua hoga sir usme demo hota hai na jo usme to usme bhi mere ko likhwaya tha har item ke niche.
Customer: To ye minimum is item ka ye rahega is item ka ye rahega.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo price ka thik hai lekin usme pucha jata hai ki aapko is tarike se use karna hai kya aapka order minimum order quantity rahega kya aapka aisa haan wahi wahi wahi. Usme waha bhi aap mana kar dete na ji ki apna to nahi jam raha yaha se IndiaMART se hai na to refund wala baat tha to refund bhi ho jata usi time pe agar aapne welcome call me bataya hota aapko proper.
Customer: Sab bataya tha maine sab bataya tha ye aapke jaise manager pehli baat hui thi usme jisko maine payment kiya tha na usko maine specifically bataya tha. Hmm hmm. Ki hamara retail ka kaam nahi hai manufacturing ka kaam hai aur equipment ka kaam hamara rehta hai minimum order ka. Hmm hmm. Unhone haan bhi bola tha.
Executive: Fir mai dekh raha hu ki aapne mail dalne ke baad aapki jinse baat hui hai unhone aapse kuch discussion kiya aur aapne kaha thik hai mai use karunga aur fir aapne wo.
Customer: Aur fir unhone bataya ab mai aapka filter kar deta hu. Ye filter daba ye kijiye filter to uske baad aapke bulk wale retail wala aayega nahi.
Executive: Fir bhi aap bolte ki nahi mera nahi ho pa raha hai aap mera refund hi kijiye aap bolte na Pramod ji.
Customer: Are bola maine kitni baar bola ki mere ko to nahi aa raha jis tarike ka mujhe customer chahiye order value jo hai match nahi ho pa raha hai aap refund hi karwaiye. Aap are agar thik hai chalo us samay unhone kuch samjha diya aapne samajh bhi liya aapne jab 10 din 15 din use kiya uske baad fir se bolte aap mail dalte ek aur. Us samay to payment diye hi tha na kyuki within one month to aapke pass hota hai ye sab karne ka.
Customer: Unhone to spasht kar diya refund ka koi option hi nahi hai hamare pass.
Executive: Accha unhone refund ke liye mana hi kar diya aapko?
Customer: Mana hi kar diya refund ka hamare koi option hota nahi hai aap ye use kijiye.
Executive: Nahi aapke pass me pura option hota hai 60 days tak halaki option hota hai aapke pass me sir pura.
Customer: To unhone bataya tha us samay ab matlab nahi koi.
Executive: Hmm to is wajah se aapka experience bhi kharab ho gaya IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan wahi baat hai.
Executive: Lekin jo ye feedback tha na sir ye aapke actually manager ke liye tha account manager ke liye tha wo to aapko guide hi kar rahe the agar aapne message dekha ho na thik se to IndiaMART ke liye nahi tha wo aapke account manager ke liye message aaya tha aapko WhatsApp pe jo aaya tha na.
Customer: Hmm. To ye unko rating gaya hai kharab matlab unko. Unse meri baat hi nahi hui thi naye manager aaye na Manju ji se meri baat nahi hui.
Executive: Haan haan lekin ye rating to abhi baat to inhone hi ki thi aapse recently hai na?
Customer: Inhone sirf pucha tha use karne rahe ho itni baat hui thi baki vishesh koi nahi hai.
Executive: Haan mai samajh gaya wo itni aapki baat hui thi lekin jo message aaya tha na aapko WhatsApp pe services feedback ka nahi tha wo account manager ke feedback ke liye tha wo current jo Manju ke liye tha wo waha jaha pe aapne us pe se not satisfied mark kar diya. Unse to koi problem nahi hai na aapka sir? Kuch galat baat boli ho unhone ya fir kuch galat guide kiya ho aapko services se related aisa to kuch nahi hai na?
Customer: Unse meri baat hi nahi hui koi.
Executive: Bas aap IndiaMART services se aur jo employees the aapke pehle jo start hua tha us samay unse satisfied nahi hai aap hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Koi nahi mai wo highlight kar deta hu aur abhi jo aapne ye recently not satisfied ka feedback diya hai ye abhi aapne I guess ki mistakenly Manju ke liye de diya hai na unke liye de diya. To isko bhi mai hata de raha hu aur ye abhi aapka ye jo ticket raise ho jata hai basically unke liye ticket raise ho gaya to to mai usko close kar de raha hu ye.
Customer: Haan to wahi baat hai. Us us samay bhi na 15000 refund manga tha us samay bhi ticket close hua tha yahi sir baat hui thi.
Executive: To abhi refund kaise hoga sir one year complete hone ke baad kaise refund hoga?
Customer: Mai bata raha hu. Mai samajh gaya us samay unhone kiya hoga lekin ab to mai aapke account manager ke against jo wo unhone 60 din wali baat batayi nahi yahi baat keh ke ticket close kar diya. To ye isliye Pramod ji ab to aapke account manager ke against me ticket open ho rakha hai na ki aapko unse problem to uske liye maine call kiya ab aap bol rahe ho ki nahi ye problem recording line pe to close hi karunga na mai sir isko bataye open rakh ke bhi kya karunga bataye. Roz mujhe call karna padega aapko usi baat yahi baat karni padegi roz aapse.
Customer: Wahi wahi wahi wahi wahi.
Executive: Abhi teen din se aapko malum hi hai mai call kar raha hu aapko sir continuously.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To bataye aap isme kuch aur discuss karna chahte hai to kariye mai aisa nahi ki close karne ke liye bol raha kuch jo bhi discuss karna chahte hai aap kariye sir discuss lekin in the end of the day to mujhe ye unke liye jo feedback diya wo close hi karna padega na sir us pe. Haan kar do kar do kar do close kar do.
Executive: Hai na usme fir se aapko mail aayega sir us pe please satisfied mark kar lijiyega wo unke jo ticket mai abhi close kar raha hu uske liye aayega ye sir feedback. Agar fir se not satisfied denge aap to fir se wo ticket hi raise hoga aur fir mai call hi karunga mai hi aapko sir fir se. Aur waise agar aapko kuch bhi discuss karna hai to Manju ka number aapke pass me hai hi aap mera number bhi note kar lijiye sir directly baat kar sakte hai aap.
Customer: Nahi mere pass nahi thik thik aap close kar dijiye.
Executive: Thik hai Pramod ji okay thank you sir thank you so much for your time sir.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's work is closed, wants refund.

- States leads are fake, no minimum order.

- Claims account manager didn't inform about refund.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified feedback was for account manager.

- Executive offered his number for direct contact.

- Executive will close the ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to mark 'satisfied' on feedback mail.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, account manager, feedback, subscription
